title: Students across Iran stage protest as economic crisis deepens
byline: Iranian students staged street protests in Tehran on Tuesday, a day after the capital’s shopkeepers demonstrated against economic hardship and won a message of understanding from the president.

title: Commission of Inquiry appointed to investigate irregularities at the Colombo Municipal Council
byline: A Presidential Commission of Inquiry has been appointed to investigate, examine, and report on alleged corruption and irregularities said to have taken place at the Colombo Municipal Council.

title: Special traffic and security plan in Colombo for New Year celebrations
byline: Sri Lanka Police have decided to implement a special traffic and security plan to minimise traffic congestion in and around Colombo and ensure public safety.

title: Last rites of music icon Latha Walpola with state patronage today
byline: The final rites of legendary Sri Lankan singer Latha Walpola is scheduled to be performed with state patronage this evening (31) at the Borella General Cemetery.

title: Shooting incident reported in Nagoda Hospital
byline: A shooting incident has been reported within the Nagoda Teaching Hospital, police stated.

title: Fairly heavy showers above 75 mm expected in several provinces today
byline: Showers or thundershowers will occur at times in Northern, Eastern, Central, Northcentral, Northwestern and Uva provinces.
